nodes.text: Gesha tea was a type of tea that was consumable by humans. It could be made with hot water and served in cups. During the Imperial Era, it was stored in a cabinet within the home of the civilians Esmelle and her wife, Shirene, on the Outer Rim planet Akiva. In 4 ABY, the rebel pilot Norra Wexley visited the home and used a kettle to make herself a cup of gesha tea.
Gesha tea first appeared in Aftermath, a 2015 novel written by Chuck Wendig.
